00001 class Simple:
00002     def __init__(self, params, random):
00003         self.random = random
00004         self.prob = params['prob']
00005 
00006     def __call__(self, ind):
00007         for i in xrange(0, len(ind.genome)):
00008             if self.random.random() < self.prob:
00009                 ind.genome[i] = ind.genome[i] ^ 1
